channel.title: Play Minecraft Offline?
channel.description: I have Minecraft and I am going to be away from internet for a few days. Is there a way I can play Minecraft without logging into my account?

item.title: Play Minecraft Offline?
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

[quote=“RankTex, post:3, topic:537901”][quote author=HcoJustin link=topic=656725.msg4394011#msg4394011 date=1388531517]
If you log in at least once with the account on that PC, the next time you go to play and it cannot connect to the login servers you will receive an option to play offline.
[/quote]

ok thanks. and one more question: Is it free to make a new account? or do i have to pay for that[/quote]

Making a new account is absolutely free, but you have to purchase the game again for that specific account.
